description.value:
You can jury-rig solutions when you don't have the proper tools on hand. You can attempt to Repair damaged items without a repair kit.

If you have the raw materials available, you can Craft a basic Caltrops{Caltrop} set, Candle, Compass, Crowbar, Fishing Tackle, Flint and Steel, Hammer, Ladder (10-foot){Ladder}, Piton, Rope, Ten-Foot Pole, Thieves' Toolkit (Replacement Picks){Replacement Thieves Picks}, Tool (Long){Long Tool} or Tool (Short){Short Tool}, or Torch as if you had their formulas.
